title: The Papers: 'Johnson in peril' as he 'fights for his future'
description: Boris Johnson's grilling on whether he lied about partygate makes up most front pages on Thursday.

title: Miami Open 2023 results: Andy Murray loses to Dusan Lajovic in straight sets
description: Two-time champion Andy Murray suffers a straight-set loss to Serbia's Dusan Lajovic in the first round at the Miami Open.

title: TikTok's US future at stake as boss faces Congress showdown
description: The video-sharing app's chief executive will testify to US lawmakers in a much-anticipated grilling.

title: Republic of Ireland 3-2 Latvia: Teenage striker Evan Ferguson scores on first start
description: In-form teenage striker Evan Ferguson scores his first international goal as the Republic of Ireland beat Latvia 3-2 in a friendly at the Aviva Stadium.

description: Rory McIlroy makes a winning start at the WGC-Dell Technologies Match Play but Matt Fitzpatrick's struggles continue with defeat in his opening group match.

title: Lindsay Lohan and Jake Paul charged in illegal crypto scheme
description: US regulators say eight celebrities failed to disclose they were being paid to promote cryptocurrencies.

title: Lyon 0-1 Chelsea: Blues get crucial European win at holders Lyon

title: Johnson on Partygate: We avoided physical contact but passed drinks

title: Miami Open 2023 results: Emma Raducanu loses to Bianca Andreescu
description: British number one Emma Raducanu is out of the Miami Open after losing to Canada's Bianca Andreescu in an enjoyable battle between two former teenage US Open champions.

title: US raises interest rates despite banking turmoil

title: Mosque fire suspect arrested over second incident

title: Rail strikes planned in March and April suspended

title: Man Utd takeover: Ineos owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe and Qatar’s Sheikh Jassim to submit improved bids
